subject: Golf
Masters Golf Tournament
lead_paragraph: Rory McIlroy shot a five-under 66 to take a four-stroke lead after the third round of the European Masters in Crans-sur-Sierre, Switzerland. McIlroy, a 19-year-old from Northern Ireland, is chasing his first European Tour victory.
snippet: Rory McIlroy shot a five-under 66 to take a four-stroke lead after the third round of the European Masters in Crans-sur-Sierre, Switzerland. McIlroy, a 19-year-old from Northern Ireland, is chasing his first European Tour victory.
